availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Wiley Plummer Griffey (Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Vilander Caldwell Luten in Fulton County, Kentucky, on December 17, 1857. Father of Luten Griffey and Ida Griffey. Farmer in Moscow, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned four enslaved persons in 1860. Foreman of the jury in the Hickman County Equity and Criminal Court case against Aaron Cline in November 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Moscow, p. 452.
